caption.p: Plant‐produced CHKVmabs reduce CHIKV viraemia in mice. Wild‐type C57 BL/6J mice ( N = 6 per group) were subcutaneously infected with 1 × 10 5 PFUs of CHIKV and treated intraperitoneally with 50 μg of indicated CHKVmab or PBS (negative control) 12 h post‐infection. Viral load in blood at day 2 dpi is presented as a ratio of CHIKV E1 copy number per 1000 copy of cellular β‐actin. ** and * indicate P values <0.01 and <0.05, respectively, of CHKVmab‐treated mice compared to that of PBS‐treated, which were determined by t‐tests.
